name: Waving Banners Flag Pack
description:
Taking some artistic liberty, this mod makes the vanilla banners wavy and includes a few new player faction flags. 
The following player-made faction flags are also included; ARS, Diable, Imperium, DME, ORA, PRV, Rusters, SCY, Legio Infernalis, Great Houses, Tiandong, Mayasura, Cabal, Kadur, and Roider. 
NOTE: To use the player-made faction flags, you will need to manually move them into the proper folders.
